transcript_chunks.text: Nick let's start with you what did you think of Captain America Brave New World you know it was exactly what I was assuming it was going to be there was not a hope there was not a dream I was just assuming we'd sit there I would eat all of an's popcorn enjoy it walk away and probably never think about it again I think the movie you can definitely tell it was a bit cobbled together I think it stood on its own two feet I think it tells a story is it a story that I'm particularly interested in watching again not really but we had some fun banter back and forth we got to see Harrison Ford I two and up scenery as Thunderbolt Ross uh and we'll talk about his performance and his portrayal of this character probably later when we get into the plot but overall I enjoyed it um and I I I I'm interested to see where it's going to rank Andy Cortez I didn't like this movie very much I thought it was it's what I expected and I was still a little bit disappointed in in that like I wasn't expecting a
